{{cpp/experimental/title|reseed}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib_extensions_2/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|experimental/random}}
{{dcl|since=libfund_ts_2|num=1|1=
void reseed();
}}
{{dcl|since=libfund_ts_2|num=2|1=
void reseed( std::default_random_engine::result_type value );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Reseeds the [[cpp/experimental/lib extensions 2#per-thread engine|per-thread random number engine]] and any {{lc|std::uniform_int_distribution}} instances used by {{ltt|cpp/experimental/randint|randint}}.

@1@ Sets the per-thread engine to an unpredictable state.
@2@ Seeds the per-thread engine {{tt|g}} as if by {{c|g.seed(value)}}. 

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|value|value of the new seed}}
{{par end}}

===Remarks===
Subsequent calls to {{tt|randint}} do not depend on values produced by the per-thread engine prior to calling {{tt|reseed}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;experimental/random&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::experimental::reseed();

    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Random 2-digit decimal numbers: ";

    for (auto i = 0; i != 3; ++i)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; std::experimental::randint(10, 99) &lt;&lt; ' ';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
Random 2-digit decimal numbers: 41 60 56 
}}
